title: Session documentation system design
summary: Designed session-docs skill to complement beads task tracking with session-level context capturing decisions and user intent.

decisions.rationale: Keeps everything in beads ecosystem, avoids redundancy with separate docs folder
Simpler than schema changes, achieves same goal of capturing rationale
alternatives_considered: Add new rationale field to beads schema

decisions.rationale: Agent should track its own work to avoid confusion, not rely on prompts

decisions.choice: Decisions and rationale, user thoughts, actionable todos
decisions.rationale: Avoid redundancy with beads (what was done) and issues (next steps)

user_thoughts: User wants non-intrusive documentation that captures planning discussions like this one. Prefers consolidation in beads over separate systems. Key insight: the purpose is to help agents not get confused in future sessions by preserving decision context.
